title: Framing Ben Shapiro Interview with Jordan Peterson in Western Civ
description:
Jordan Peterson is bread-pilling atheists and they don't quite know why. Here I walk through a history of religion and philosophy to see why the likes of Jordan Peterson, Sam Harris, Scott Adams, Ben Shapiro, Steven Pinker are all sometimes allies and sometimes rivals. How did Martin Luther launch this? 

https://youtu.be/WT0mbNvaT6Y
